user.description:
First, you need to download the Goal Zero app: https://www.goalzero.com/product-features/yeti-app/

Follow the instructions to connect your Yeti to your Wi-fi network. DHCP reservation is recommended. If not set up, the device may become unavailable until Home Assistant detects the new ip address. Set it up in your router settings for the device. Refer to your router's user manual.
user.title: Goal Zero Yeti
